sentences.en: Before that, a "butter-and-egg man" was slang for a visitor with a lot of money, a yokel ready to be separated from his funds.
sentences.cn: 在那之前，一个“黄油和鸡蛋人”是对有钱拜访者的俚语，一个将要和他的资金分离的庄稼汉。

sentences.en: His mouth was agape in yokel fashion.
sentences.cn: 他张着口,一副土包子的样子.

sentences.en: Listen to the local yokel yodel.
sentences.cn: 听听那个本地土包子唱的岳得尔调.

sentences.en: The clothes makes him look like a slack - jaw yokel.
sentences.cn: 这件衣服让他看起来像个土包子.

sentences.en: The clothes makes him look like a yokel.
sentences.cn: 这件衣服让他看起来像个乡巴佬。

sentences.en: They are listening to the local yokel yodel.
sentences.cn: 他们正在听那个本地土包子唱歌.
